cause.description:
"The Rich Cronin Hope Foundation is a non-profit foundation established to promote global awareness about Leukemia and other blood cancers while supporting patient care and fund raising for agencies (such as the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society) who pledge to fight for these goals. The Foundation promises to be a voice to the world and a source of hope. Through its founder, Rich Cronin, and all those touched by his music, his friendship and his love, the Foundation is RELENTLESS FOR A CURE. Get involved. It could be the most important thing you do. Together, we can defeat Leukemia."
For more information, please visit:
http://www.richcroninhopefoundation.com
1. "FIGHT THE GOOD FIGHT"
